short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests AI-powered guidance for solving LeetCode problems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your coding practice on LeetCode with LeetGuide AI, a powerful Chrome extension that integrates seamlessly with your problem-solving workflow. LeetGuide AI provides instant, AI-powered feedback on your code submissions, helping you improve your skills and master algorithms more efficiently.

Adds an "Evaluate AI" button directly to LeetCode problem pages.
Introduces an "AI Result" tab within the LeetCode interface.
No need to leave the page or copy code between applications.

Access templates that reflect the structure interviewers look for.
Follow answer formats designed to align with coding interview best practices.
Increase your chances of success by using templates that interviewers expect.
Gain consistent structure and thought processes during daily practice and real interviews.

Identify areas for improvement specific to your coding style.
